name: PandeMood
description:
The recent pandemic has led people to repress their own emotions and feelings, not being able to express them and staying isolated. We want to stress the importance of knowing your feelings and what they truly mean.

DIVE INTO YOUR EMOTIONS

  • Single player vs game 
  • Puzzle-platform game
Trailer Walkthrough Creators:
  • Bona Andrea
  • Gaino Simone 
  • Gravante Gianluca 
  • Perelli Riccardo 
  • Puggioni Veronica
  • Rungi Monica
Project realized for Game Design Course of Politecnico di Torino.
